text: Jean Brankart (12 July 1930 â€“ 23 July 2020) was a Belgian professional road bicycle racer. He was active from 1953 to 1960. In 1955, Brankart finished the 1955 Tour de France in second place, winning two stages. Brankart was born in Momalle, Belgium. Brankart died on 23 July 2020, aged 90.Jean Brankart, tweede in Tour 1955, op 90-jarige leeftijd overleden ==References== Category:Belgian cyclists Category:1930 births Category:2020 deaths
title: Jean Brankart
